text: Luke Adam Dean (born 14 May 1991) is an English professional footballer who plays as a midfielder for Matlock Town. ==Career== Dean joined Bradford City's centre of excellence in 2002. He made his club debut against Morecambe on 13 April 2010. becoming the first Asian home grown player to make his debut as a professional for Bradford City. He rewarded with a contract on 16 June 2010 but suffered a setback when he broke his leg in a pre-season friendly. Dean moved to Ossett Town on loan in March 2011 but was recalled a month later by new Bradford City manager Peter Jackson. Luke Dean was the only player of the 2011 Bradford City out of contract players to be handed a new contract, which would keep him at the club until at least June 2012. In August 2011, he joined Hinckley United on a month-long loan deal, alongside Darren Stephenson. In May 2012, Dean was released from Bradford .Bantams clear-out gets underway Skysports, 12 May 2012. Retrieved on 12 May 2012. He signed for Harrogate Town of the Conference North in the summer of 2012. In January 2015, Dean signed a one-month loan deal for Bradford Park Avenue. In February 2015, Bradford Park Avenue and Harrogate Town agreed to extend the loan deal until the end of the 2014–15 season. Dean joined Scarborough on 25 May 2017.LUKE DEAN READY FOR NEW CHALLENGE AT BORO‚ scarboroughathletic.com, 25 May 2017 He played for the club until May 2019, where he signed with Matlock Town.Kittrick makes first signings at Matlock, evostikleague.co.uk, 28 May 2019 ==References== ==External links== * * *Bradford City A.F.C. official profile Category:1991 births Category:Living people Category:People from Cleckheaton Category:English footballers Category:Bradford City A.F.C. players Category:FC Halifax Town players Category:Ossett Town F.C. players Category:Hinckley United F.C. players Category:Harrogate Town A.F.C. players Category:Bradford (Park Avenue) A.F.C. players Category:Workington A.F.C. players Category:English Football League players Category:National League (English football) players Category:Northern Premier League players Category:Association football midfielders Category:Scarborough F.C. players Category:Matlock Town F.C. players
title: Luke Dean (footballer, born 1991)
